files.name: command-menu-section-demo.tsx
files.content: "use client" import React from "react" import { Button, CommandMenu } from "ui" export default function CommandMenuSectionDemo() { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = React.useState(false) return ( <> Home Docs Components {users.map((user) => ( {user.name} ))} ) } const users = [ { id: 1, name: "Barbara Kirlin Sr.", image_url: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=1" }, { id: 2, name: "Rosemarie Koch", image_url: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=2" }, { id: 3, name: "Mrs. Reva Heaney Jr.", image_url: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=3" }, { id: 4, name: "Ms. Ettie Abshire DVM", image_url: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=4" }, { id: 5, name: "Bria Ziemann", image_url: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=5" }, { id: 6, name: "Heloise Borer Sr.", image_url: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=6" }, { id: 7, name: "Miss Jacinthe Gerlach DVM", image_url: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=7" }, { id: 8, name: "Miss Stephania Schaefer Sr.", image_url: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=8" }, { id: 9, name: "Kevon Hackett MD", image_url: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=9" }, { id: 10, name: "Tom Ledner", image_url: "https://i.pravatar.cc/150?img=10" } ]
